name: 4x4 Off-road Driving Simulator
description:
Go offroad and kick up some serious dirt in the latest, all thrills offroad truck racer simulator. Get all access to a huge open world filled with places to explore and collectibles to grab! Choose from tons of amazing offroad 4x4 racing trucks, unlock them by completing challenges and collecting special items spread throughout the huge open map!

Get ready and rev your engines to explore wherever you want with tough, strong trucks, choose from all sorts of offroad vehicles to climb the steep hills and mountains to reach the tallest peaks of the map. Watch all of the destruction as you crash your way through the interactive environment, smash into fences, walls, postboxes, fire hydrants, lampposts, and more!

With over 200 collectibles in this huge detailed world, you'll be having awesome time exploring. The more you collect, the better trucks you will unlock which will help you explore even more of the world! Each truck comes with it's own very unique set of skills to help you navigate through this cool truck simulation.
